revised_title: Investigating the Photo-Electric Discharge from Metallic Surfaces in Different Gases
tldr: The author investigates the photo-electric discharge from metallic surfaces in various gases, focusing on the dependence of the photo-electric current on the pressure and nature of the gas. The experiments reveal that the current increases rapidly with the potential difference up to a certain value, after which the increase is more gradual until another critical value is reached, when a further increase in the potential causes a rapid increase in the current.
